name: Lingueo
tag_list: language-learning, resource-sharing, education, groups, learning, teaching, cms, course-management-system, lms, learning-management-system, web-classroom, virtual-classroom, tutorials, webcam, video
overview: Lingueo is a language learning website, with social networking features. People can use the site’s search feature to find language tutors; members will search for people who are native speakers of the language they are learning and videochat online.

milestones.description: Lingueo.com Raises 500,000 EUR from three business angels
